snippet.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets PC 100% Walkthrough - Part 5: Dungeons
snippet.description:
If this would be a Let's Play with my commentaries, Myrtle wouldn't be the only one deserving the nickname "Moaning". Fortunately enough, that is not the case. In order to decipher who the mysterious heir is, the Three Stooges come up with a plan to...infiltrate Slytherin common room, the place of all evil, where nice spells turn into vicious curses, where chocolate frogs taste like poop, and where there are iron maidens instead of comfy beds. Maybe it's not so bad but...what can you expect from an entire house with one characteristic: being evil?
Anyway, an extended survey of Snape's larder reveals why he is always so grumpy, cornish pixies, orange snails, fire crabs, gnomes, spiders and Peeves, talk about a pest problem.
Harry is gonna exterminate most of them, but ransacking supplies is his idea of a good deed being its own reward.

4 Bronze Wizard Cards
2 Silver Wizard Cards
7 Secrets

1st Bronze Wizard Card: 3:51
1st Silver Wizard Card: 3:51
Secret 1: 3:51
2nd Bronze Wizard Card: 6:17
Secret 2: 7:08
2nd Silver Wizard Card: 7:08
Secret 3: 8:16 + 8:45
Secret 4: 8:16 + 9:04
Secret 5: 9:45 + 10:12
3rd Bronze Wizard Card: 10:43
4th Bronze Wizard Card: 12:45
Secret 6: 13:46 + 14:12
Secret 7: 14:32 (yep, you do need to jump on the floating planks in order for the wall to come down)
